name: SurgeryRespiratorySystemLarynx
title: Surgery Respiratory System Larynx
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Surgery Respiratory System Larynx.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Surgery Respiratory System Larynx.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Surgery Respiratory System Larynx are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Surgery Respiratory System Larynx are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
